effect_entries.effect:
Used by a trainer in battle
:   Attempts to [catch]{mechanic:catch} a wild Pokémon.  If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.

:   If the wild Pokémon's base [speed]{mechanic:speed} is 100 or more, its catch rate is 4× normal.
effect_entries.short_effect: 4× effectiveness on Pokémon with 100 or greater base speed. (Gen II: Roaming or Fleeing Pokémon). Made from Wht Apricorn.

flavor_text_entries.text:
にげあしの　はやい　ポケモンが
捕まえやすくなる
ちょっと　変わった　ボール。

A Poké Ball that makes it easier to
catch Pokémon that are usually
very quick to run away.

Poké Ball un po’ diversa particolarmente efficiente
con i Pokémon bravi a scappare.

Contiene los datos del Pokéathlon con el número
de victorias en Atrapabanderas.

Ein Ball, der sich besonders gut eignet, um flinke
Pokémon zu fangen.

Une Poké Ball un peu spéciale qui fonctionne
particulièrement bien sur les Pokémon qui ont
tendance à fuir.

도주가 빠른 포켓몬이
잡기 쉬워지는
조금 특이한 볼.

にげあしの　はやい　ポケモンが
つかまえやすくなる
ちょっと　かわった　ボール。

A Poké Ball that makes it easier to
catch Pokémon which are quick to
run away.

A Poké Ball that makes it easier to
catch Pokémon which are quick to
run away.

Une Poké Ball un peu spéciale qui
fonctionne particulièrement bien sur
les Pokémon qui ont tendance à fuir.

A Poké Ball that makes it easier to
catch fast Pokémon.
